Mashup.description: Simple Mashup used to ask questions of the data within the "PTCDTS.TWXLLM.ExampleData_DT" Data Table.
Mashup.name: PTCDTS.TWXLLM.DataQuery_MU

FieldDefinition.description: Disables zooming in and out within the mashup
FieldDefinition.name: disableZoom

FieldDefinition.description: Open the mashup in full screen mode
FieldDefinition.name: fullScreenMode

FieldDefinition.description: The height of the mashup page
FieldDefinition.name: height

FieldDefinition.description: Use the height of the device display, or a custom height (in px)
FieldDefinition.name: heightType

FieldDefinition.description: The initial zoom scale when the mashup is loaded for the first time
FieldDefinition.name: initialScale

FieldDefinition.description: A title for the mashup shortcut on the iOS home screen
FieldDefinition.name: iosShortcutIconTitle

FieldDefinition.description: The style of the iOS status bar
FieldDefinition.name: iosStatusBarAppearance

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum scale that users can zoom out to
FieldDefinition.name: maximumScale

FieldDefinition.description: The minimum scale that users can zoom out to
FieldDefinition.name: minimumScale

FieldDefinition.description: The width of the mashup page
FieldDefinition.name: width

FieldDefinition.description: Use the width of the device display, or a custom width (in px)
FieldDefinition.name: widthType

DataShape.description: Data Shape for example data to be used for demo purposes.
DataShape.name: PTCDTS.TWXLLM.ExampleData_DS

ConfigurationChange.changeReason: fields : DateTime : added, asset : added, status : added, pressure : added, temperature : added, speed : added, vibration : added, voltage : added, flow : added, torque : added, rpm : added, power : added

Thing.description: Example data to be used for demo purposes.
Thing.name: PTCDTS.TWXLLM.ExampleData_DT

ConfigurationTable.description: Configurable options to tune Data Table performance
ConfigurationTable.name: PersistenceProviderCustomSettings

ServiceDefinition.description: Generates random data for demo purposes. This never needs to run unless the user wants to generate other data than what already exists in the Data Table.
ServiceDefinition.name: GenerateRandomDemoData

ConfigurationChange.changeReason: services : AddDemoData : service updated, service deleted GenerateRandomDemoData : service added
services : GenerateRandomDemoData : service updated GetDataStatus : service added

Thing.description: Manager Thing for the TWXLLM demo application.
Thing.name: PTCDTS.TWXLLM.Manager

ServiceDefinition.description: Takes the natural language question entered by the user in the Mashup and adds the necessary context and information for the LLM to generate the data query, aggregate parameters, and a natural language preamble for the final answer. Example question: "What was the average temperature recorded on Machine3 during December 2024? "
ServiceDefinition.name: CreatePrompt

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns an example question to display in the Mashup.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetExampleQuestion

ServiceDefinition.description: Passes the complete prompt (natural language question plus context and information) to the LLM and returns the result.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetLLMTextResponse

ServiceDefinition.description: This is the main service that takes the question from the Mashup, orchestrates the flow of data and information through the other services to ultimately produce a natural language answer that is displayed in the Mashup.
ServiceDefinition.name: ProcessQuestion

FieldDefinition.description: Master service that orchestrates the flow of data and information through all the other services to generate a final answer. An example user question is "What was the average temperature recorded on Machine3 during December 2024?"
FieldDefinition.name: userQuestion
